title: Inferno52
author: Inferno52
content: Pariz Metaverse is now ahead of Sandbox & Decentraland  in terms of daily transactions as reported by Dappradar.Developed by Trace Network Labs on the Polygon network, Pariz has revolutionized the way we experience fashion and lifestyle in the digital realm.In just two months since its launch, Pariz Metaverse has soared ahead, surpassing both Sandbox and Decentraland in terms of daily transaction counts. Dappradar, a renowned industry analytics platform, has verified the incredible growth of Pariz, highlighting its rising popularity and user engagement. Interestingly $TRACE, the native token of Trace Network on Huobi and Gate exchange has a market Capitalisation of $900k which i expect to soar to $10M considering the growth of Pariz Metaverse and the Upcoming launch of AR/VR devices by Apple. This is because Pariz Metaverse has strategically adopted a "browser first and VR ready" approach from day one.In conclusion, Pariz Metaverse stands tall as a superior metaverse platform, outshining Sandbox and Decentraland with its unrivaled features and remarkable growth.

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: If it was that tall, you wouldn't be shilling it, lol

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: First of all, thanks for sharing the information (which isn't very useful here), but it would be better if you attached a link to the report made by DappRadar so that your statement looks more convincing.Quote from: Inferno52 on May 24, 2023, 11:52:38 AMInterestingly $TRACE, the native token of Trace Network on Huobi and Gate exchange has a market Capitalisation of $900k which i expect to soar to $10MSource: CoinmarketcapWhy do you expect the MC of $TRACE to increase to 10M? Is it only from Pariz Metaverse daily transaction reports that it exceeds daily transactions from Sandbox and Decentraland? LOL, that's so ridiculous, man. As you can see in the image above, even people are not very keen on trading $TRACE tokens, it can be seen that on Huobi it only has around $48K.

comments.author: siniminomorocomunisakito
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on May 24, 2023, 02:19:38 PMFirst of all, thanks for sharing the information (which isn't very useful here), but it would be better if you attached a link to the report made by DappRadar so that your statement looks more convincing.Quote from: Inferno52 on May 24, 2023, 11:52:38 AMInterestingly $TRACE, the native token of Trace Network on Huobi and Gate exchange has a market Capitalisation of $900k which i expect to soar to $10MSource: CoinmarketcapWhy do you expect the MC of $TRACE to increase to 10M? Is it only from Pariz Metaverse daily transaction reports that it exceeds daily transactions from Sandbox and Decentraland? LOL, that's so ridiculous, man. As you can see in the image above, even people are not very keen on trading $TRACE tokens, it can be seen that on Huobi it only has around $48K.Yes. That true, the data and facts speak despite the message the OP conveyed about simply informing the unrivaled features and being an extraordinary trajectory for users that Pariz Metaverse has initiated/offered beyond Sandbox's AR/VR device technology. this is what I read from the post above.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: I would still pick more established projects like Decentraland for long-term investments over some newly launched projects that are yet to be tested. What's happening to Pariz looks like a sign to avoid since the hype will peak sooner or later hehe. Let's see where it ends up once these hyped investors move on to newer platforms for the sake of chasing profits.

comments.author: Iyeman
comments.body: Trace network is crapPariz metaverse is as bad as trace networkBoth of them were crap. I have tried to use pariz as a guess and my impressions if it's not even better than ps2 game. It's crap metaverse. Trace network is a scam coin. This shitty coin dumped from 60 cents to the 1 cents. Crap coin.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on May 24, 2023, 02:44:36 PMI would still pick more established projects like Decentraland for long-term investments over some newly launched projects that are yet to be tested. What's happening to Pariz looks like a sign to avoid since the hype will peak sooner or later hehe. Let's see where it ends up once these hyped investors move on to newer platforms for the sake of chasing profits.Decentraland is dead as far as I know.  Last I heard it had only a couple daily users and it's only become less popular since then.  I wouldn't be surprised if literally nobody is using it nowadays.  I've also never heard of Pariz so if it has any volume at all it's likely from the founders.  The Sandbox however is partnered with plenty of big brands and is constantly having play to earn events with celebrities endorsing the products that are continuously being minted by users.  Unless I'm completely out of touch here, the Sandbox is the only metaverse actively doing much of anything these days.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on May 24, 2023, 02:44:36 PMI would still pick more established projects like Decentraland for long-term investments over some newly launched projects that are yet to be tested. It's not good for long term. OP wants only shilling his coin. He knew that if it's almost dead. that's why he was looking for the new buyers by shilling it here. About decentraland, the platform has no incentive for the players unlike sandbox which was always creating competition. Im still actively playing sandbox caused by i can still get decent amounts of reward from there. I never heard land players got incentive from active in the metaverse.Quote from: Yogee on May 24, 2023, 02:44:36 PMWhat's happening to Pariz looks like a sign to avoid since the hype will peak sooner or later hehe. Let's see where it ends up once these hyped investors move on to newer platforms for the sake of chasing profits.Pariz never got hyped. Even its parcent coin trace network coin already dead since it was dumping so hard and never recovered again. What i can take from this thread is as a promotional thread only.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on May 24, 2023, 02:44:36 PMI would still pick more established projects like Decentraland for long-term investments over some newly launched projects that are yet to be tested. What's happening to Pariz looks like a sign to avoid since the hype will peak sooner or later hehe. Let's see where it ends up once these hyped investors move on to newer platforms for the sake of chasing profits.It's a wise choice, mate. Not a few of us (people in crypto) are only concerned with a low MC in a project, with the aim of getting a lot of profit. Those people forget the most important thing in choosing an investment, which is the fundamentals of a project and big names. Instead of having to invest in $TRACE, like you, I would also choose proven projects like Decentraland or Sandbox.
